strapiPost.title: Tech Startup Offers Payments For Help Advancing Decentralized Networks
strapiPost.content:
Mycelium Networks, a Fayetteville tech startup, is on a mission to accelerate the world’s adoption of decentralized networks, and you can get paid to help!

  • Ecosystem of innovation: In two short years, Mycelium Networks has united individuals and businesses to build the nation’s densest testbed for IoT devices, and it will continue deploying decentralized networks to advance the tech space in Northwest Arkansas. 
  • Help accelerate the future: If you’re not a “techie,” don’t worry. Mycelium is for everyone. Mycelium Networks vets the tech and provides the equipment for you to help keep the network online. Then you can sit back and receive monthly payments while helping promote innovation in our area! 

Join Mycelium today to be an early adopter of new tech in NWA, HERE.
